org.apache.ctakes.ytex.uima.resource

Class InitableJdbcConnectionResourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.ytex.uima.resource.InitableJdbcConnectionResourceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JdbcConnectionResource

    public class InitableJdbcConnectionResourceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JdbcConnectionResource
    copied from mayo JdbcConnectionResourceImpl. extended to set transaction isolation level.

    modified to default to settings in ytex.properties in case config parameters not specified in descriptor

    remove refs to wrapped sql connection
